title: cool_morning_adjacent_cornfield
summary: Cool early-morning conditions observed at a cornfield adjacent to MaMeeFarm.
description: This data unit documents cool morning atmospheric conditions at a cornfield adjacent to MaMeeFarm. The observation captures early daylight, low-temperature ambience, and crop rows under calm conditions, providing contextual environmental data relevant to surrounding agricultural activity.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for inspection convenience only and does not function as a cryptographic anchor within the DGCP verification chain.
